Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_HighcareServiceHistory' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_HighcareServiceHistory] GO CREATE VIEW v_HighcareServiceHistory AS select t.CompanyID, d.LineNbr, t.SrvOrdType, t.RefNbr as soRefNbr, a.RefNbr as aptRefNbr, t.CustomerID, d.InventoryID, i.InventoryCD, i.Descr, i.StkItem, i.PriceClassID, d.UOM, t.OrderDate, equip.SMEquipmentID as SMEquipmentID, equip.UsrPINCode as PINCode, pin.CPriceClassID as CustomerpriceClassID from FSServiceOrder t inner join FSAppointment a on t.CompanyID = a.CompanyID and t.SOID = a.SOID inner join FSSODet d on t.CompanyID = d.CompanyID and t.SrvOrdType = d.SrvOrdType and t.RefNbr = d.RefNbr inner join InventoryItem i on t.CompanyID = i.CompanyID and d.InventoryID = i.InventoryID inner join INItemClass c on t.CompanyID = c.CompanyID and i.ItemClassID = c.ItemClassID inner join FSEquipment equip on t.CompanyID = equip.CompanyID and d.SMEquipmentID = equip.SMEquipmentID inner join LumCustomerPinCode pin on t.CompanyID = pin.CompanyID and t.CustomerID = pin.BAccountID and equip.UsrPINCode = pin.PIN inner join LUMServiceScope sc on t.CompanyID = sc.CompanyID and pin.CPriceClassID = sc.CPriceClassID and (i.PriceClassID = sc.PriceClassID OR d.InventoryID = sc.InventoryID)
